a64multi5.label: Multicolor charset for Commodore 64, extended with 5th color (colram) (codec a64_multi5)

libsvtav1.label: SVT-AV1(Scalable Video Technology for AV1) encoder (codec av1)

flv.label: FLV / Sorenson Spark / Sorenson H.263 (Flash Video) (codec flv1)

libx264.label: libx264 H.264 / AVC / MPEG-4 AVC / MPEG-4 part 10 (codec h264)

libx264rgb.label: libx264 H.264 / AVC / MPEG-4 AVC / MPEG-4 part 10 RGB (codec h264)

msmpeg4.label: MPEG-4 part 2 Microsoft variant version 3 (codec msmpeg4v3)

svq1.label: Sorenson Vector Quantizer 1 / Sorenson Video 1 / SVQ1

adpcm_ima_alp.label: ADPCM IMA High Voltage Software ALP

aptx_hd.label: aptX HD (Audio Processing Technology for Bluetooth)

mp2fixed.label: MP2 fixed point (MPEG audio layer 2) (codec mp2)

pcm_bluray.label: PCM signed 16|20|24-bit big-endian for Blu-ray media

pcm_dvd.label: PCM signed 16|20|24-bit big-endian for DVD media
